verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>. A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> maketh a <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>; But a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H8424>heaviness<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>.
Treasures <S%H214><s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H6666>nothing<s%>; But righteousness <S%H5337>delivereth<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not <S%H7456>suffer<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to <S%H7456>famish<s%>; But he thrusteth <S%H1920>away<s%> the <S%H1942>desire<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
He becometh <S%H7326>poor<s%> that <S%H6213>worketh<s%> with a <S%H7423>slack<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%>; But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> maketh <S%H6238>rich<s%>.

He that <S%H103>gathereth<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> is a <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>; But he that <S%H7290>sleepeth<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> that causeth <S%H954>shame<s%>.
Blessings <S%H1293><s%> are upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; But <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
The <S%H2143>memory<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed<s%>; But the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H7537>rot<s%>.
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%>; But a <S%H8193>prating<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall<s%>.
He that <S%H3212>walketh<s%> <S%H8537>uprightly<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H983>surely<s%>; But he that <S%H6140>perverteth<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%>.
He that <S%H7169>winketh<s%> with the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5414>causeth<s%> <S%H6094>sorrow<s%>; But a <S%H8193>prating<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall<s%>.

The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>; But <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
Hatred <S%H8135><s%> stirreth <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H4090>strifes<s%>; But <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H3680>covereth<s%> all <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>.

In the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of him that hath <S%H995>discernment<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%>; But a <S%H7626>rod<s%> is for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of him that is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
Wise <S%H2450><s%> men lay <S%H6845>up<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish<s%> is a <S%H7138>present<s%> <S%H4288>destruction<s%>.
The rich <S%H6223>man<s%>'s <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>: The <S%H4288>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is their <S%H7389>poverty<s%>.
The <S%H6468>labor<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> tendeth to <S%H2416>life<s%>; The <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, to <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
He is in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> that <S%H8104>heedeth<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%>; But he that <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H8582>erreth<s%>.
He that <S%H3680>hideth<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%> is of <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>; And he that <S%H3318>uttereth<s%> a <S%H1681>slander<s%> is a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> there <S%H2308>wanteth<s%> not <S%H6588>transgression<s%>; But he that <S%H2820>refraineth<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> doeth <S%H7919>wisely<s%>.
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is as <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>: The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is little <S%H4592>worth<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>; But the <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H2638>lack<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, it maketh <S%H6238>rich<s%>; And he <S%H3254>addeth<s%> no sorrow <S%H6089>therewith<s%>.
It is as <S%H7814>sport<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2154>wickedness<s%>; And so is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> to a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H4034>fear<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, it shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H8378>him<s%>; And the desire of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%>.
When the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5674>passeth<s%>, the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is no <S%H6662>more<s%>; But the righteous is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3247>foundation<s%>.
As <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to the <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, and as <S%H6227>smoke<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, So is the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> to them that send <S%H7971>him<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3254>prolongeth<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; But the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7114>shortened<s%>.
The <S%H8431>hope<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H8057>gladness<s%>; But the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H8537>upright<s%>; But it is a <S%H4288>destruction<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>removed<s%>; But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> bringeth <S%H5107>forth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; But the <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> what is <S%H7522>acceptable<s%>; But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> speaketh <S%H8419>perverseness<s%>.
